StringTable.Label: GameMode_Arena_Desc
StringTable.String: No AI players and the human players are locked at war.

StringTable.Label: GameMode_Agenda_Desc
StringTable.String: An objective is randomly assigned to all human players. The first to complete it wins the game.

StringTable.Label: GameMode_HiddenAgenda_Desc
StringTable.String: Randomly assigned an objective that you must meet to win the game. Only you know what your agenda is.

StringTable.Label: GameMode_Survival_Desc
StringTable.String: Humans are permanently at war with the AI players and the AI players slowly gain bonuses. The humans will die, the winner is the one who lasts the longest.
